title: Non-conjugated linkage enabling a quinone-based cathode material with long cycle life and high energy density for aqueous zinc batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02097A, Communication
Lu Lin, Zhiqing Xue, Tong Qiu, Jiaqi Zhu, Guoli Zhang, Hongtu Zhan, Kuo Wang, Xiaoqi Sun
A phenyl cross-linked tri-p-benzoquinone cathode realizes 150 000 cycle life with 143 mA h g−1 capacity retained at 100 A g−1.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
